Message:
Back in our training days,
when I caught Elaine
lazing about, she said to me...

“Humans have no
real purpose in life.
That’s why Lord Samyaza
is giving us one—
the beautiful purpose
of saving the world.”

“But really, we don’t
need anything like that.

We should just live
for whatever we find
to be beautiful.”

“That’s a nice excuse for
skipping out on training,
you rule-breaking nun,” I thought.

But...part of me understood
where she was coming from.

Now, I’m fighting to save
the world with the holy sword
Lord Samyaza bestowed upon me.

But...the one I truly
want to protect is...

Ever since we sealed that
Curse away, the Hero of the Staff’s
health had worsened.

Caladbolg’s scabbard
has the power to heal.
If I can use it to help him,
even just a little,
that’s what I want to do...!
